name: Batman: Justice Unbalanced
description: Welcome to Batman: Justice Unbalanced - a puzzle-adventure game developed by The Learning Company. Join Batman, Robin,and Batgirl as they try to save Gotham city from the evil clutches of the The Penguin and Two-Face. The Dynamic Duo needs your help to foil their super-foes. Explore the dark streets and soaring heights of Gotham to find clues that will help put The Penguin and Two-Face behind bars! You’ll need fast reflexes and quick wits to help Batman and Robin restore justice in Gotham City.
